Reviews.Content: stayed ac cuzco june 2012 9 nights business hotel located beside main street castellana located business district real madrid soccer stadium hotel described business hotel catering else located 50m cuzco subway station getting madrid convenient madrid metro europe clean efficient hotel size appointed minimally bed comfortable somewhat surprised safe provided nor coffee maker iron surprise sit hotel watch tv english channels available laundry service quick day service taxi fare barajas international airport run 25 30 euro taxi driver route happened colleagues excellent restaurants minute walk hotel tapas close breakfast hotel assortment cold hot meat cereals pastries taxi fare main downtown attractions located 1012 euros lot madrid museums night life clubs 6 7am recommend hotel business castellana liked wifi included amenities mentioned

Reviews.Content: stayed property separate occasions times check service smooth efficient arrived check time clean adults travelling party found beds adults beds singles attached couple apart didnt bother ac stayed barcelona property provided free minibar stock beer water tomato orange juice fitness center provides water bottles treadmill broken visit unlike ac property barcelona provide snacks tea coffee evenings gold extra perks ac property lacks extras upgraded corner suite requesting happy staff supervisor tried harder offered continental breakfast extra charge lieu breakfast buffet paid couldnt flight checkout event efficient taxis readily available property foot cuzco metro station citibank 5 minutes walk nearby tapas restaurants irish pub stay property try tasca la farmacia dining tapas experience 5 min walk hotel staff direct location cuzco metro station 7 stops heart madrid city plaza de espana 1015 euros taxi madrid regional atocha renfe train station 20 25 euros airport wifi free lobby free gold couple lacking perks gold overall excellent property

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel for what I pay.”

Reviews.Content: madrid football match location 5 minutes walk santiago bernabeu stadium service excellent lobby nice bit dark taste nice roomy nice modern interior downside breakfast poor otherwise rating 5 stars 4 stars annoying door majority occupants letting door close result lot noise wondering am notice hold door noise getting taxi easiest taxi easily expensive

Reviews.Content: stayed held business function 3 days november 2011 service breakfast facilities sufficient restaurants business lunches nearby dissappointing highly frustrating aspect wifi constantly unavailable hotel improve

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, payable services”
Reviews.Author: dvtraveler25
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights ac november positive free minibar refilled day breakfast nice spacious modern location business metro station 1520 minutes city centre 40 minutes airport comfortable bed clean bathroom helpful staff negative inroom safe ironing setup payable laundry service spanish tv channels expensive poor service free wifi lobby 12€ 24h card using internet althought pay expected services id recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: stayed week hotel hotel breakfast proximity metro airport internet availability lack basic iron ironing board staying service grumpy uncommon madrid staff surly additionally prostitutes walking hotel nude bars outside im doesnt sound bad found bit sleazy liked bit obvious sleep wasnt street noise below loud

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 5 nights found nice hotel modern design furnishings art kingsized bed comfortable breakfast buffet morning nice service fastest hotel fast weird forget ham egg plate nights row minifridge stocked waters juices beer free nice touch fitness nice modern equipment 4 machines television nice free bottled water wireless internet slow bit finicky buy access cards front desk remember check dont irons actually isnt iron ironing board entire property pay shirt pressed business meeting location close lots stuff airport staff friendly speak english notice taking service speak english

Reviews.Content: hotel visitors internet nightmare buy prepaid cards wireless service front desk access service provided cards message cards else call due difficulties hotels internet center bad news portable computer six keyboard keys missing nightmare incredible happened fifth day hotel call front desk requesting payment bill credit euros 1400
